test_cases.name: Store Settlement&Position Account Balances Before Transfers

assertions.description: Status to be 200 or error code 3001
State to be OPEN or Window is empty
Number of associated windows should be 1
Associated Settlement Window ID should be as closedWindowId
Associated Settlement Window state should be PENDING_SETTLEMENT
Associated number of participants should be 4
DEFERREDNET calculation for testfsp1 should be 80.09
DEFERREDNET calculation for testfsp2 should be -75.667
DEFERREDNET calculation for testfsp3 should be -10.1857
DEFERREDNET calculation for testfsp4 should be 5.7627

test_cases.name: Store Settlement&Position Account Balances After Transfers

requests.description: check state for participants after prepare

assertions.description: Settlement Id should be as expected
Settlement Window ID should be closed
Settlement Window State should be PENDING_SETTLEMENT

requests.description: testfsp1 settlement&position accont balance after prepare

assertions.description: Testfsp1 settlement account balance before and  after prepare should be the same.
Testfsp1 position account balance before and  after prepare should be the same.

requests.description: testfsp2 settlement&position accont balance after prepare

assertions.description: Testfsp2 settlement account balance before and  after prepare should be the same.
Testfsp2 position account balance before and  after prepare should be the same.

requests.description: testfsp3 settlement&position accont balance after prepare

assertions.description: Testfsp3 settlement account balance before and  after prepare should be the same.
Testfsp3 position account balance before and  after prepare should be the same.

requests.description: testfsp4 settlement&position accont balance after prepare

assertions.description: Testfsp4 settlement account balance before and  after prepare should be the same.
Testfsp4 position account balance before and  after prepare should be the same.

requests.description: check state for participants after reserve

assertions.description: Settlement Id should be as expected
Settlement Window ID should be closed
Settlement Window State should be PENDING_SETTLEMENT

requests.description: testfsp1 settlement&position accont balance after prepare

assertions.description: Testfsp1 settlement account balance before and  after reserve should be the same.
Testfsp1 position account balance before and after reserve should be the same.

requests.description: testfsp2 settlement&position accont balance after reserve

assertions.description: Testfsp2 settlement account balance before and  after reserve should be the same.
Testfsp2 position account balance after reserve gets increased by its net settlement amount.

requests.description: testfsp3 settlement&position accont balance after reserve

assertions.description: Testfsp3 settlement account balance before and after reserve should be the same.
Testfsp3 position account balance after reserve gets increased by its net settlement amount.

requests.description: testfsp4 settlement&position accont balance after reserve

assertions.description: Testfsp4 settlement account balance before and after reserve should be the same.
Testfsp4 position account balance before and after reserve should be the same.

requests.description: check state for participants after prepare

assertions.description: Settlement Id should be as expected
Settlement Window ID should be closed
Settlement Window State should be PENDING_SETTLEMENT

requests.description: testfsp1 settlement&position accont balance after prepare

assertions.description: Testfsp1 settlement account balance before and  after commit should be the same.
Testfsp1 position account balance after commit should be reduced by its net settlement amount.

requests.description: testfsp2 settlement&position accont balance after commit

assertions.description: Testfsp2 settlement account balance before and after commit should be the same.
Testfsp2 position account balance after reserve gets increased by its net settlement amount.

requests.description: testfsp3 settlement&position accont balance after commit

assertions.description: Testfsp3 settlement account balance before and after commit should be the same.
Testfsp3 position account balance before and after commit should be the same.

requests.description: testfsp4 settlement&position accont balance after commit

assertions.description: Testfsp4 settlement account balance before and after commit should be the same.
Testfsp4 position account balance before and after commit should be the same.

requests.description: check state for participants after settle

assertions.description: Settlement Id should be as expected
Settlement Window ID should be closed
Settlement Window State should be SETTLED

requests.description: testfsp1 settlement&position accont balance after prepare

assertions.description: Testfsp1 settlement account balance before and after settle should be the same.
Testfsp1 position account balance before and after settle should be the same.

requests.description: testfsp2 settlement&position accont balance after settle

assertions.description: Testfsp2 settlement account balance before and after commit should be the same.
Testfsp2 position account balance before and after commit should be the same.

requests.description: testfsp3 settlement&position accont balance after settle

assertions.description: Testfsp3 settlement account balance before and after commit should be the same.
Testfsp3 position account balance before and after commit should be the same.

requests.description: testfsp4 settlement&position accont balance after settle

assertions.description: Testfsp4 settlement account balance before and after commit should be the same.
Testfsp4 position account balance before and after commit should be the same.
